You prepare the list of paladin spell that be available for you to cast, choose from the paladin spell list. When you do so, choose a number of paladin spell equal to your Charisma modifier+ half your paladin level, round down( minimum of one spell). The spell must be of a level for which you have spell slot.

For example, if you be a 5th-level paladin, you have four 1st-level and two 2nd-level spell slot. With a Charisma of 14, your list of prepared spell can include four spell of 1st or 2nd level, in any combination. If you prepare the 1st-level spell Cure Wounds, you can cast it use a 1st-level or a 2nd-level slot. Casting the spell do n't remove it from your list of prepared spell.

You can change your list of prepared spell when you finish a long rest. Preparing a new list of paladin spell require time spent in prayer and meditation: at least 1 minute per spell level for each spell on your list.

Charisma be your spellcasting ability for your paladin spell, since their power derives from the strength of your conviction.
